quote: Until then, Commander Maddox, I will continue learning, changing, growing, and trying to become more than what I am.
author: Data

quote: If only rain could fall inside a room.
author: John M. Hull

quote: When you don't create things, you become defined by your tastes rather than ability. Your tastes only narrow & exclude people. so create.
author: Why the lucky stiff

quote: Beware of overconcern for money, or position, or glory. Someday you will meet a man who cares for none of these things. Then you will know how poor you are.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Anything you need to quantify can be measured in some way that is superior to not measuring it at all.
author: Tom Gilb

quote: There are a million ways to lose a work day, but not even a single way to get one back.
author: Tom DeMarco and Timothy Lister

quote: No one is against you. They are for themselves. Learn this and you will make friends of enemies.
author: Ed Calderon's mother

quote: You can't pickpocket a naked man; so just get naked.
author: Ed Calderon's unnamed friend

quote: Lots of the people were mean, and most of them were miserable, even the ones with digital watches.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Men are what they are because of what they do. Not what they say.
author: Fredrik Backman, A Man Called Ove

quote: If you're thinking without writing, you only think youâ€™re thinking.
author: Leslie Lamport

quote: A time... comes for every man, when he chooses what sort of man he wants to be. And if you don't know the story, you don't know the man.
author: Fredrik Backman, A Man Called Ove

quote: I'd rather die drunk, broke at 34 and have people at a dinner table talk about me than live to be rich and sober at 90 and nobody remembered who I was.
author: Andrew, Whiplash

quote: So I saw that there is nothing better for a person than to enjoy their work, because that is their lot.
author: Solomon
